author: fabiocos
body:
backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/49801
to 14_1_X branch. The code has been adapted for the MtdSD part as the structure was originally different.

#### PR validation:

Code compiles, simple addition of MessageLogger printouts.
title: [Backport 14_1_X] Simulation: prevent exception if trackId larger than 200M
